main event: A civilian observed a very large, bright object in a descending flight path over Tucson, Arizona.
interesting points: The object appeared similar to a very large star and was described as having a non-blinking bright orange-red light,The sighting lasted for 5-7 minutes,The observer noticed the object disappearing gradually over the horizon,The observer was in a car and had gotten out to look at the object,The object was compared to airplane lights, only brighter in intensity.
sighted object: a very large bright object with orange-red light
